strings: <voice_0x01000FC1><se_low>King Trode: Wait a second, <hero>. For some reason, Medea doesn't want to move away from the spring.
<voice_0x01000FC2><se_low>King Trode: Just give her a moment or two.
<voice_0x01000FC3><se_low>King Trode: Can you come over here? For some reason, Medea doesn't want to move away from the spring.
<se_low>King Trode: Oh, my precious Princess.
<se_low>King Trode: What a cruel disappointment. Still, we must carry on. Let us redouble our efforts to bring Dhoulmagus to account for his sins.
Medea gazes sadly at the spring...
Let Medea drink from the mystical spring?
Medea hangs her head in despair.
<Cap><leader> lets Medea drink the spring water.
<voice_0x01000FC4><se_high>Princess Medea: I'm terribly sorry to behave so selfishly, <hero>, but...I have a favour to ask.
<voice_0x01000FC5><se_high>Princess Medea: I'm only human for the briefest of moments after drinking from the spring...
<voice_0x01000FC6><se_high>Princess Medea: ...but it would make me very happy if you could bring me back here every now and then.
<voice_0x01000FC7><se_high>Princess Medea: I'd like to be able to talk to you again, <hero>. Just like we used to, back at the castle.
<voice_0x01000FC8><se_high>Princess Medea: We can forget all about the curse, even if it's only for the few minutes we share together...
<voice_0x01000FC9><se_high>Princess Medea: I can feel the enchantment wearing off!

<voice_0x01000FCA><se_low>King Trode: Consider it as a request from me as well.
She asks for so little of us.
It really is the least we can do.

<voice_0x01000FCB><se_low>King Trode: Actually, no.
Think of it as an order.
Understood, <hero>?

<voice_0x01000FCC><se_low>King Trode: I didn't quite catch you, <hero>.
My ears must need cleaning. Come again?
<voice_0x01000FCD><se_low>King Trode: Will you grant her this one request?

<voice_0x01000FCE><se_low>King Trode: Very well.
Now that that's decided, we can move on.

<voice_0x01000FCF><se_low>King Trode: Very well.
Now that that's decided, we can move on...
Wait a moment!
<voice_0x01000FD0><se_low>King Trode: This won't do! You're forgetting something important, <hero>.

<voice_0x01000FD1><se_low>King Trode: He must be the man we heard about in Argonia!
The old wizard who lives in the forest to the west!
<voice_0x01000FD2><se_low>King Trode: If I'm not mistaken, he knows something about the magic mirror. We'd better visit his home and ask him about it.
